SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,SUM(A.ERROR_CNT) AS ERROR_CNT ,SUM(A.JUDG_CNT) AS JUDG_CNT ,B.ROUT_NM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_DVC_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
GROUP BY A.REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.REP_ROUT_ID

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') ERROR_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,SUM(A.ERROR_CNT) AS ERROR_CNT ,SUM(A.JUDG_CNT) AS JUDG_CNT ,B.ROUT_NM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_DVC_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
GROUP BY ERROR_DT, A.REP_ROUT_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT "장애건수" AS ERROR_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,SUM(A.ERROR_CNT) AS ERROR_CNT ,SUM(A.JUDG_CNT) AS JUDG_CNT ,B.ROUT_NM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_DVC_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
GROUP BY "", A.REP_ROUT_ID
